text: Bogolyubovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Konstantinogradovsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 174 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 57 km from Sterlitamak, 3 km from Konstantinogradovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Bogolyubovka, Sterlitamaksky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
